The network manager properties

access.description: Indicates the access allowed for this particular rule

description.description: A description for this rule. Restricted to 140 chars.

destinations.description: The destination address prefixes. CIDR or destination IP ranges.

direction.description: Indicates if the traffic matched against the rule in inbound or outbound.

displayName.description: A friendly name for the rule.

priority.description: The priority of the rule. The value can be between 1 and 4096. The priority number must be unique for each rule in the collection. The lower the priority number, the higher the priority of the rule.

protocol.description: Network protocol this rule applies to.

sources.description: The CIDR or source IP ranges.

kind.description: Whether the rule is custom or default.

properties.description: Indicates the properties of the security admin rule

deleteExistingPeering.description: Flag if need to remove current existing peerings.

description.description: A description of the connectivity configuration.

displayName.description: A friendly name for the resource.

isGlobal.description: Flag if global mesh is supported.

useHubGateway.description: Flag if need to use hub gateway.
